title: What kind of champion does LoL need?
body:
Hi there.
Does anyone think that LoL needs a special kind of champion, like a splitpush support, a tank adc or a assasin support. That kind of stuff. I am just curiousðŸ˜‚

replies.body: I think shen can cover the splitpush support pretty well but I would like to see it cranked up to the next level like a utility focused tank with an ally teleport ult or something

Tahm is ver y good cleAring creeps also has a teleport so is the support split pusher other one could be Zilean. He is fast enough to makes rotations and QwQ explode all the wave! Zzrot and banner of command and you are done!
I played against a zzrot Zilean once and it was the most frustrating thing I've ever played against
Right now is the best split pusher supp
Or an ult like Shen, except, when they port they actually switch places with an ally, and the drop is like panths ult, only for both people....that would be interesting to see.

I had this idea for a support who was a rain god, and his ult would basically be a global ally targeted ability that created an aoe around the ally and he would basically come down from the sky and shield all allies in the aoe and knock up enemies
Honestly, as long as I get more yordle champions, don't care what kind. But more support/jungle yordles would be nice.
Tank ADCs already exist just because they aren't marksman doesn't mean they don't do a lot of ad and carry.

> Tank ADCs already exist just because they aren't marksman doesn't mean they don't do a lot of ad and carry.

Well ye, but i mean like a marksman who builds tanky. xD

>tank adc

Please leave.

Ap marksmans. 

That don't have bs abilities to make ppl invulnerable.

{{champion:17}} 

But yeah, I get what you mean, we could use more than him.
{{champion:268}} Apparently Azir's secondary role is Marksman.
Strange... Yeah, he's ranged, even without his soldiers, but he's more of a mage if anything.

I thought a debuff support would be really cool but tough to make satisfying 

Like what if there was a witch character who had to collect essences from her allies/enemies and trap them in a totem and all her spells interacted with the totem depending on whose essence she holds

Kinda a soul collector witch doctor kinda deal
A supp that can swap positions with an Ally and has a good wave cleAring potential!

When I played Dota 2 briefly I was an extreme fan of the invoker. The ability to have different abilities be available with different utilities make it extremely challenging and allows you to perform a different role every battle. Basically the invoker 3 normal abilities create an elemental charge and the ultimate changes based on what charges are up at that time. 

I also thought it would be cool to have a support type who increases damage damage based on the type of skill he uses while lowering other damage types. For example, if you used an ice attack ashe and sejuani's damage would be increased however you would lower an Annie's damage. That could be cool but would require too much coding in all likelihood.

AD support aren't needed but desired. 

More midlane tanks/counters for assassins in midlane.

An actual debuff support.

Lulu and Sona are the closest things to that, yet most of such players only see their poke potential.
All the roles you mentioned can already do what you said. So no, I don't think there needs to be any champion specifically designed like that.
